subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: After bringing back Marcus Camby, Raymond Felton and even Kurt Thomas for a time, the Knicks re-signed 33-year-old Quentin Richardson, who played with the team from 2005 to 2009.
snippet: After bringing back Marcus Camby, Raymond Felton and even Kurt Thomas for a time, the Knicks re-signed 33-year-old Quentin Richardson, who played with the team from 2005 to 2009.
